definition: to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech

sentences.english: And this is something the service has been angling for.
sentences.chinese: 這正是這個服務一直謀求的事情。

sentences.english: Women of middle and lower classer have been laboring in different trades and seeking for economic independence.
sentences.chinese: 中下層女子從事各種行業的勞動，謀求經濟自立。

sentences.english: To do my duty, for the good of mankind in general.
sentences.chinese: 要善盡職責，爲全人類謀求福祉。

sentences.english: Understanding historic mission, Embodying life value and Repaying motherland by industries.
sentences.chinese: 認清歷史使命，體現人生價值，謀求產業報國。

sentences.english: He overreached himself in trying to get the manager's job.
sentences.chinese: 他不自量力想謀求經理職位，但沒成功。

sentences.english: They never pursue self-interests but work wholeheartedly for the revolution.
sentences.chinese: 他們從不謀求私利，而是一心一意爲革命工作。

sentences.english: And this leads to the principle of the greatest good for the greatest number.
sentences.chinese: 從而引出“爲最多的人謀求最大的幸福“這一原則。

sentences.english: We seek no bases, nor do we want to control these nations.
sentences.chinese: 我們不謀求建立基地，也不希望控制這些國家。

sentences.english: China’s military tradition is characteristically one of seeking peace.
sentences.chinese: 中國軍事傳統的基本特色是謀求和平。

sentences.english: To use one's superior rank to gain an advantage.
sentences.chinese: 弄權，利用某人的高級職位謀求利益。

sentences.english: Duracell is also innovating, including a battery charger that works in a car.
sentences.chinese: 金霸王正在謀求革新，比如開發車載電池充電器。

sentences.english: Mr. Brown is seeking a teaching position at the local collage.
sentences.chinese: 布朗先生正在當地的大學謀求一份教書工作。

sentences.english: He announced Monday he wouldn't seek re-election in 2012.
sentences.chinese: 他在週一宣佈不會謀求在2012年獲得連任。

sentences.english: Five state funds have sought to own TRCs under varying circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 五個國家資金謀求個人的儲稅根據不同的情況。

sentences.english: He enrolled with an employment agency for a teaching.
sentences.chinese: 他在職業介紹所登了記，以謀求一個教師的職位。

definition: railtrack connection/to integrate into sth/to dock/to connect/to be in step with/to bring into line with/to align
to take an alternate route (idiom)/to find an alternative/to take a different approach/to blaze a new trail
to run in the opposite direction (idiom); to run counter to
stuck and not moving forward (idiom); stagnant/in a rut/at a standstill
(Tw) to draw on (others' experience)/to learn from (how others do things)/lesson to be learned (by observing others)
